creator: jake@infinitylimited.net
text:
Various browsers attempt to download an image, and will hang.
wget reports:
wget http://www.infinitylimited.net//jake/infltd_banner.jpg
--15:03:39--  http://www.infinitylimited.net//jake/infltd_banner.jpg
           => `infltd_banner.jpg'
Resolving www.infinitylimited.net... 68.144.22.155
Connecting to www.infinitylimited.net[68.144.22.155]:80... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response...
15:03:39 ERROR -1: Malformed status line.

There is no entry in the logs for this attempted download.

Full Server ID String:
[Thu Sep 11 20:20:03 2003] [notice] Apache/2.0.47 (Gentoo/Linux) mod_ssl/2.0.47 
OpenSSL/0.9.6j PHP/4.3.2

Please disable sendfile and try again.

<Directory />
(existing stuff)
EnableSendfile Off
</Directory>
creator: trawick@apache.org
